::Composer::

      Composer was shaking for a moment, but stopped, when Motormaster left
and Astral walked over.

       "Y...y...you okay?" He said shakily, from the shock of witnessing his
very first battle.

          It could've been worse, he thought, he could've engaged in combat.
But then again, he was destined to fight once in his life.

          "It's nice to meet you, I'm Composer," He paused for a moment,"Oh,
how rude to leave you waiting for me to answer your question.  Yes, if you
don't mind, I would like to go to the base."
